original_text:
He put a new song in my mouth,
    a song of praise to our God.
Many will see and fear,
    and put their trust in the Lord.
korean_text: 새 노래 곧 우리 하나님께 올릴 찬송을 내 입에 두셨으니 많은 사람이 보고 두려워하여 여호와를 의지하리로다

sentences.original_text: He put a new song in my mouth,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 내 입에 새 노래를 넣으셨네,

sentences.original_text: a song of praise to our God.
and put their trust in the Lord.
